text: Hello all you beautiful people! This week
on Kick the Grind we've got something
extra special.
How does a abandoned spy base outside of
Berlin sound?? Pretty sick?
Let's check it out.
Oh my god...
Penis! (echo) Whistle (Echo)
GÃ¼ten Abend Everybody! I am back in
Germany after a year ago when I filmed
that video in Teufelsberg. Teufelsberg
actually means Devil's mountain, and they
built that Cold War listening station on
top of all of the rubble they pulled out
of Berlin in World War Two. Under those
domes is all kinds of hidden history
that no one will ever see again. I'm all
one hundred percent down for exploring
abandoned places, but this place you
can't exactly just sneak into. There are
people there, they will get very angry
and they will kick you out. So make sure
you have a contact like we did, or I
believe they're doing tours there. Just
do your research first. If you show up
and try to sneak in, you're going to get
disappointed. You're not going to be allowed in.
So! Experience of Posessions. Kick the Grind
and i will check you guys like always
next Wednesday. See you then!
